sentence.Network_en: They suffered a lot under the invader's heel.
sentence.Network_cn: 在侵略者的铁蹄下,他们受尽了奴役.

sentence.Network_en: The state of the Chinese civilization was equally inviting to an invader.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于入侵者来说,中国文明的情况同样是诱人的.

sentence.Network_en: A country must have the will to repel any invader.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个国家得有决心击退任何入侵者.

entry.def: Invaders are soldiers who are invading a country.

example.ex: The invaders were only finally crushed when troops overcame them at Glenshiel in June 1719.
example.tran: 1719 年 6 月，部队在格兰舍一役击败了入侵者，直至此时他们才最终覆灭。

entry.def: You can refer to a country or army that has invaded or is about to invade another country as an invader .

example.tran: 抵抗外国侵略军的战斗

means.word_mean: 1. someone who enters by force in order to conquer
